SELECT product.id, product.brand_id, product.category_id, product.name, product.description, product.image, brand.name AS brandName, product_category.name AS categoryName FROM product LEFT JOIN brand ON product.brand_id = brand.id LEFT JOIN product_category ON product.category_id = product_category.id
AND product.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{product.name}, '%')
ORDER BY product.id DESC

SELECT product.id, product.name, product.description, product.image, brand.name AS brandName, product_category.name AS categoryName, product_detail.introduction, product_detail.content FROM product LEFT JOIN brand ON product.brand_id = brand.id LEFT JOIN product_category ON product.category_id = product_category.id LEFT JOIN product_detail ON product.id = product_detail.product_id WHERE product.id = #{id}
SELECT id, product_id, name, value FROM product_attribute WHERE product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY id
